channel.title: profiling on Developer Playground
channel.description: Recent content in profiling on Developer Playground

item.title: Mariadb tips
item.description: Profiling SET GLOBAL general_log='ON'; SET GLOBAL slow_query_log='ON'; SET GLOBAL log_output='TABLE'; SELECT * FROM mysql.general_log; truncate table mysql.general_log; Change date to today update table_name set date = DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL DATEDIFF(NOW(), date) DAY); Create account create user 'root'@'%' identified by 'YOURPASSWORD'; grant all privileges on *.
